channel.title: Arch Install Guide on The Cove of Bahmoudd
channel.description: Recent content in Arch Install Guide on The Cove of Bahmoudd

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Outlines what the guide will and will not go through, requirements for installing Arch and guide notation

item.title: Booting the Arch Live ISO
item.description: Informs you on how to boot into the Arch Live ISO and basic things like setting up keymaps and font sizes in the Live ISO

item.title: Connect to the internet
item.description: Informs you on how to connect to the internet in the Arch Live ISO

item.title: Partitioning the drive
item.description: Informs you on what partitions to make, how to make them, and how to format and mount them

item.title: Pre-chroot configuration
item.description: Informs you on how to set up the mirrorlist, fstab file and how to install the bare minimum so that you can fully set up the operating system later

item.title: Chroot configuration
item.description: Informs you on how to set the time, date, locale, language, root password and any user accounts

item.title: Logging into your user account
item.description: Informs you on how to install the programs that allow you to have a comfortable desktop experience and how to set up pacman and networking so that they can be used properly.

item.title: Window and display managers
item.description: Informs you on how to choose and install a window manager and a display manager
